I honestly fear what will become of #ProWrestling worldwide if @WWE is allowed to expand its monopolistic umbrella any further.
@Tweakedenigma I dunno if they could go it at 4 though.
@Tweakedenigma But only if they share financial burdens, but it'd be nice to see a big cross-promotional show where talent from all 4 go ham
@Tweakedenigma but I don't know if that would be anywhere near enough.
@Tweakedenigma TNA would add a surprising amount of star power to cross promotional stuff. Lashley in Japan would be cool 4 a minute.
@Tweakedenigma I would genuinely like to see there be an alliance amongst promotions, somewhat territory like, w/ anti-WWE agenda.
@Tweakedenigma I honestly thought they had died after they separated from TNA until Bruce Tharpe brought the belt to njpw.
@voiceswrestling NOAH need to be given as much attention as possible in 2017. We need to get eyes on them so they can rise in prominence.
@Tweakedenigma @nwasmokymtn I know Bruce Tharp would hate me saying this, but I didn't think the NWA was relevant anymore
@voiceswrestling NOAH is on a definite upward swing. I was live at the Jan 7th show (I'm on camera a lot) and it was absolutely amazing.
Help me to keep #DiscoveringWrestling ! Tell me your favorite local indy promotions! I'm always on the #hustle and #grind to write more.
